short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically removes shopping-related content from Perplexity AI search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🛍️ ➡️ 🚫 Say Goodbye to Shopping Content in Perplexity AI Search Results!

This lightweight extension automatically:
✨ Removes shopping sections
✨ Eliminates "Related Products" recommendations
✨ Hides all product cards
🎯 Focus on what matters - pure search results!

💡 Key Features:
• Works instantly after installation
• Runs automatically - no configuration needed
• Open source & transparent

🔒 Privacy & Security:
• Minimal permissions required
• Only runs on perplexity.ai

📦 Open Source:
https://github.com/jasonjiaox/disable-perplexity-shopping
Feel free to raise an issue on GitHub!
